title: Necropoli di San Placido
description: A large Roman necropolis in Messina, uncovered in 1914 during the works to build the modern Palazzo della Prefettura.

properties.description: Representative location of a large Roman necropolis in Messina, in the area of the modern Palazzo della Prefettura, derived from an OpenStreetMap node.
properties.title: OSM location of Necropoli di San Placido
